title: How to write essay writing in competitions - Quora

response.answer_text: Preparing an essay is actually an art which requires a great deal of critical thinking. And if you are competing in an essay writing contest you should portray a great presence of mind and excellence in expressing your ideas. When you get the topic of assignment to ponder on it and note down the important points that come across your mind. The easiest way to write a good essay is to follow the guidelines given below:- Introduction First of all, you should introduce the topic to the reader. Inscribe the importance of the topic (historical importance, social importance etc.) Discuss the main issue the essay is going to deal with. You have to grab the attention of the reader here. You should let the reader know what the essay is going to deal with. Give your thesis statement in this section. Purpose In this portion, you should describe the purpose of the essay and what you think about the subject. Evidence Here you should list out the evidence which you have to support your argument. The source of the evidence should be quoted here. You should ensure that the evidence you provide is actually relevant to the topic. Assumptions You have to write your assumptions on the topic in this section. You have to draft content in this portion which should be acceptable to the reader and suits his taste. Implications In this section of the essay, you should elucidate the implications and consequences of the topic described in the essay. You have to amplify the implication of your findings relating the issue here. Inference/ Conclusion You have to keep in mind that this is your last word to the reader. Being the ending strike of the essay it should leave an impression to your reader. This section should restate the thesis statement which you have done previously in the introduction. Then conclude all the main thoughts you have discussed in the essay. There should be no new theories or arguments in your essay. If you still find it difficult to write the essay or have below writing skills you can also check for essay writing help. Thank you for your time.

You first of all have to know the kind of competition it is and how to go about it. You need to get a topic for the essay or you need to find the basic idea. With the help of your browser, you can get more ideas about your theme and samples of such writings. After gathering your ideas and noting them down, plan a layout for your essay. Your introduction must be the type that gives a brief on what you are to talk about. Make sure your ideas are well explained and are in simple English. Try to derive a catchy conclusion and you will end up with a very good essay.
